review: The new Lenovo does everything I need in a laptop. Excellent speed lots of memory good feature set. It runs either Windows 10 or 11 which is nice if you don't want to move to the later version.

We ordered 8 of these; they arrived quickly and were in good shape. I have opened one up to provision for a new user and Windows is not only unlicensed but it will NOT activate. I'm hoping the seller responds in a timely manner. I haven't checked the others yet.
